Hartford.Connecticut General Life Insurance Compa: The Connecticut General Life Insurance Company Headquarters is a historic award-winning commercial office complex at 900 Cottage Grove Road in Bloomfield, Connecticut. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places on January 27, 2010. Built between 1954 and 1957, it is an important early example of suburban commercial office architecture, and one of the state's best example of the International style of architecture.
